title: Common: Smokin’ Aces
itunes:title: Common: Smokin’ Aces
description:
Common is a fellow Chicago legend and an Oscar, Grammy, and Emmy winner. But most importantly he created our theme song out of thin air. Too bad Jeremy can’t keep a beat to save his life. The old pals also talk about their time together on the movie Smokin’ Aces and about growing up in Chi-Town. 

Remember, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail at  https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven to be featured during “Rolling Calls with Ari Gold” where Jeremy answers questions from the listeners as Ari Gold. 

 

IG: https://www.instagram.com/howulivinjpivenpodcastshow

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/howulivinjpivshow

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/

Common’s IG: https://www.instagram.com/common

Common’s Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/common

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Common is a fellow Chicago legend and an Oscar, Grammy, and Emmy winner. But most importantly he created our theme song out of thin air. Too bad Jeremy can’t keep a beat to save his life. The old pals also talk about their time together on the movie Smokin’ Aces and about growing up in Chi-Town.
